body.name: IDS Online Contemporary Walnut Wood Executive Swivel Ergonomic with Arms for Home Office Furniture Bentwood Mid Back Desk Chair, Black 25D x 20W x 42H in
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 52 mins
features: Contemporary Style - Black PU leather, Mid Back and bentwood cover for desk chair. Unique design will bring a very stylish and chic look to your home and office.
Ergonomic Design - Feature ergonomic curved seats and backs with padded seat cushion to mimic the natural curves of your body to provide you with a comfortable sitting experience.
Comfortable - Adjustable height, minus the risks associated with back pain or complications of the vertebra.
360-degree - Swivel function to facilitate complete rotation.
body.description: The Polyurethane chair structure is a twentieth-century raw material with brilliant quality and weight, which is famous for being protected and because the compound is not used with a completely zero serving limit and hence we considered it fit for the desk chair. While flammability is increasingly intensive, it is widely used in chairs, poker tables and so on. Also waterproof, it is protected when it is humid and can also be cleaned dry. What's more, what's even more surprising is that PU cow leather can biodegrade. Lighten up the work area executive chair conversation because it is soft and pleasant. Also provided with it, is high density shaping foam- PU foam of very high concentration intended for use as a structure material that’s got anti-oxidation properties, highly resilient to elasticity, comfier and skin friendly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: IDS Home Furniture At IDS online store we understand the need of variety and quality products for the eager customers, and not just limit ourselves to being a commercial center which most stores serve the purpose these days. “Quality > Quantity” is our motto and we are dedicated to deliver good quality product in our stock at a low cost. IDS Home Bentwood Mid Back Swivel Executive Chair Product Description The Polyurethane chair structure is a twentieth-century raw material with brilliant quality and weight, which is famous for being protected and because the compound is not used with a completely zero serving limit and hence we considered it fit for the desk chair. What's more, what's even more surprising is that PU cow leather can biodegrade. Lighten up the work area executive chair conversation because it is soft and pleasant. Bentwood Chair Armrest PU Leather Headrest 360 Degree Swivel with Adjustable Guard

KEY FEATURES MULTI-FUNCTION MECHANISM The mesh office chair has many adjustable features to ensure you to find a good seat position. You only need to adjust the handle under the cushion. STABLE BASE The wheels provide a strong and stable base holding up to 250~300lbs. While offering full 360 degree movement, alongside strong wheels which support the base. SMOOTH AND DURABLE CASTERS The PU casters provide great mobility, suitable for hard floors, carpet and more, without noise during swivelling and they don't scratch the surface of the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars solid, good looking, comfortable
reviews.reviewText: It was really easy to put together. The trick is to loosely fit all the screws and tighten them up round robin (that's a life hack for assembling anything made of wood).The chair looks good, it feels sturdy and is quite comfortable to use. We're very pleased with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Chair was easy to assemble and relieved 2 extra roller which was a nice touch. It is sturdy and comfortable..Height can be adjusted easily. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Received a defective product: the arm of the chair did not attach to the side of the chair as the screw holes did not match. In addition to this, the chair itself did not match the 360-view shown, as there is a large silver metal plate in the back (where the base attached to the back), ruining the good look of the wood. It is also fairly stiff and certainly not ergonomic, despite what the name suggests. For these reasons, I decided to refund it and not get a replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adds a great wooden touch to your home office
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy the aesthetic of the chair. The black vegan leather and wood go together very nicely to add a great professional touch to any home office. I am experiencing some discomfort sitting down. It feels like there is something (lightly) poking through the bottom of the seat cushion. It is not a severe discomfort, but this is also great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up with comfortable seating
reviews.reviewText: I am a tall man at 6’3”. This chair fits me nicely. It is comfortable with nice arm rests. Definitely a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Squeaky and not very comfortable. It had some nicks on the wood as well. I could have dealt with it but for the price. No.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute but the arms
reviews.reviewText: The arms were a trial an a half to get on but it all paid off super cute office chair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Loose bolts and sqeaky
reviews.reviewText: I’m a little disappointed in this chair. It’s great looking and fairly comfortable, but the bolts for the armrests have easily stripped and can no longer be tightened. This leaves me with loos arms. Though it’s not irritating, the chair overall is also pretty squeaky.
